file_content.text: Good evening to all, and welcome to the Adamas Space Station. I'm Ensign Reyal.
Welcome to the Adamas Space Station, my lord. I'm Ensign Reyal.
Good evening, sir, welcome to the Adamas Space Station.
I gather this visit is because you'll be traveling through to the surface of Hoth?
No, no, not at all. I am merely assigned to assist.
I did not come here to share my plans with ensigns.
My apologies to one and all. I am merely assigned to assist you.
Uh, I'm dreadfully sorry, my lord. I was assigned to assist you upon arrival.
Oh, I didn't mean to pry, sir. I've been assigned to assist you.
I'll be scanning you so I can customize your cold-weather equipment, then I'll arrange your briefing.
There we are. As you're on the VIP list, Lieutenant Halpern will brief you. He's in the theater. Good day.
